articles.author: Jason Owens
articles.title: WCWS Game 1: Texas scores wild win over Texas Tech as Reese Atwood knocks in game-winning runs on failed intentional walk - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: Wednesday's Game 1 of the WCWS had everything but a Texas Tech win.
articles.content:
Texas Tech was trying to intentionally walk Reese Atwood.
But the Texas catcher had other ideas. Atwood swung at a 3-0 offering from NiJaree Canady that found the plate for a two-run single in the b… [+3328 chars]

articles.author: Benj Edwards
articles.title: New filament lets you 3D-print parts in authentic 1980s Apple computer color - Ars Technica
articles.description: Mac fan paid $900 to color-match iconic Apple beige-gray “Platinum” plastic for everyone.

articles.author: Sophie McEvoy
articles.title: CD Projekt Red clarifies Unreal showcase of Witcher 4 was tech demo, not gameplay - GamesIndustry.biz
articles.description: CD Projekt Red has emphasised that footage of The Witcher 4 showcased at State of Unreal 2025 was not gameplay.
articles.content:
CD Projekt Red has emphasised that footage of The Witcher 4 showcased at State of Unreal 2025 was not gameplay.
